item.title: I am reading....
item.description: 2024 :o: - The Pragmatic Programmer :o: - System Design Interview :o: - Building Microservices: Designing Fine-Grained Systems :white_check_mark: - To Read List [] - A Mind for Numbers by Barbara Oakley [] - Software Architecture: The Hard Parts by Neal Ford, Mark Richards, Pramod Sadalage, Zhamak Dehghani [] - Go in Practice by Matt Butcher and Matt Farina Blink: The Power of Thinking Without Thinking by Malcolm Gladwell Thinking, Fast and Slow by Daniel Kahneman The Catalyst: How to Change Anyoneâ€™s Mind by Jonah Berger Biased: Uncovering the Hidden Prejudice That Shapes What We See, Think, and Do by Jennifer L.
